text: overview
Privacy Protection Guideline Version Update Tips:
Thank you for using Tencent's meeting.
We have updated the "Guidelines for Privacy Conservation of Tencent Conference", mainly including the following content:

1. According to product function updates, operating activities and advertising related expressions are added. For details, please refer to the second part of "How do we collect and use your information".
2. According to the latest product of the product, the path of your feedback on your opinion is correct. For details, please refer to the sixth "your right".
3. In contact, we add the way to contact us by filling in personal information protection and privacy issues to facilitate your feedback.

4. Adjust and optimize the personal information collection list. For details, please click the "Information We Collect the Information" button to refer to the content of the "Tencent Conference Personal Information Collection List".

In order to better protect your relevant rights, it is recommended that you carefully read the updated privacy protection guidelines. If you have any questions and suggestions on the content of the privacy protection, you can announce it through the 10th part of the privacy protection guidelines.Contact us for contact, thank you for your support to Tencent Conference.
You are welcome to use Tencent Conference!

The Tencent Conference is an online conference product provided by Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "us"). The company's registered place is the 35th floor of Tencent Building, the Tencent Building on the Malling Community Technology Middle School of Maling Community, Yuehai Street, Nanshan District, Shenzhen.
label: Contact Information

text: In the process of product operation, we will also jointly operate with affiliated companies, such as channel cooperation and brand linkage.

We will help you understand the situation of our collection, use, storage, and sharing of personal information through the "Guidelines for Privacy Protection of Tencent Conference" (hereinafter referred to as the "Privacy Protection Guide"), as well as the relevant rights you enjoy.

· In order to provide you with the Tencent Conference -related services, we need to collect information that you actively provide or due to the service provided by your service, we will explain the type and corresponding use of the above information;
label: First Party Collection Information

text: · You can access, correct, delete your personal information and manage your authorization on related pages;
label: Edit/Control

text: · We will use the industry's leading security technology to protect your personal information.
label: Data Security

text: You can read the full version of the Tencent Conference Privacy Protection Guide to understand more detailed personal information processing rules such as the corresponding relationship between the type and use of personal information, including:
1. Related definition
2. How do we collect and use your personal information
Third, the storage of information
Fourth, information security

If you understand and agree to accept the guidance of this privacy protection, please click "Agree" to start receiving our services.

text: We collect information for third -party information sharing list and SDK directory
1. Related definition
Related definition:
1.1 Personal user: Individual users refer to individuals who use personal mobile phone numbers, WeChat registration, and use Tencent Conference;

1.2 Enterprise users: Refers to individuals or organizations who register, log in, use Tencent conference products and services, and obtain management authority, including but not limited to legal persons, government agencies, other organizations, partnerships, or individual industrial and commercial households (hereinafter referred to as "enterprise users")Items
Enterprise users can invite and authorize individual users to join the enterprise organization as their end users.

1.3 End users: End users refer to the Tencent Conference service by enterprise users, or invited by enterprise users to join the enterprise organization, and use the individual or individual users who use Tencent Conference.
When a business user invites you as an end user to access the enterprise organization, you will receive an invitation and you can choose whether to join the business user.
1.4 Enterprise user administrator: refers to individuals who have the operation authority designated by the company's user management background system;
Enterprise user administrators can be one or more.

1.5 Data controlled by enterprises: Refers to the information and data submitted or generated during the process of using the company users and the user of the enterprise users, including the information and data submitted or required by the business user, and the information distributed by the enterprise user to the end user.As well as information to complete work needs and meet the daily management needs of enterprises.
1.6 Personal information: Refers to various information related to recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other ways.

1.7 Personal sensitive information: It refers to personal information that once leaked or illegally used to cause personality dignity of natural persons to be infringed or personal and property security. In this privacy protection guidelines, the specific personal sensitive information is significantly identified by the thick body).
1.8 Children: Refers to minors under the age of 14.
2. How do we collect and use your personal information

In the process of using Tencent's conference services, we strictly abide by the provisions of laws, regulations, and the agreement with users. In accordance with the guidelines of this privacy protection, collect it as described below, use the active provided by your service or due to the service provided by the service, or generate the service because of the service service.The information is used to provide you with services, optimization of our services, and ensuring your account security.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: You can click "We Collection of Information" to learn more about the specific scenarios, related information types, collection purposes, collection methods, and processing methods of collecting and using your personal information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: 2.8 Document Function: You can use the document function to cooperate with other users participating in the same meeting. Document services are provided by Tencent documents. For related data security policies, please refer to the "Tencent Document Data Security White Paper" and "Tencent Document Privacy Insurance Guidelines".

First Party Collection Information

text: Enterprise administrators can export a list of conferences that are currently being held or ended. The content includes the meeting number, the theme of the meeting, and the start time.
label: Important

text: 2.10, voting function: When you set up non -anonymous voting in the Tencent Conference, we will record the nicknames, avatars and votes of relevant voters, and the host of the meeting can be viewed only.

text: The voting record will be preserved as the information of the meeting, and the creator of the meeting alone can be viewed after the meeting.

Important

text: 2.23, personalized human voice enhancement function: When using Tencent Conference to conduct real -time meetings, you can open the personalized human voice enhancement function. The Tencent meeting enhances the voice of the speaker according to the voice characteristics of the spokesperson in the meeting, suppressing the background of the backgroundDrives people's noise.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
Usage
rewrite: When using the Tencent Conference for real -time meetings, you can enhance the voice of a spokesman through personalized human voice.

text: In order to achieve the distinction between speakers' voices, the Tencent Conference will classify sound -based characteristics through a orderly way.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: The Tencent meeting classified sound -based characteristics through a programmatic method.

text: For the processing technology of sound pattern in this process, please understand:

2.23.1, during the use process, the Tencent Conference complied with the principle of "minimal enough". The related sound pattern characteristics are only distinguished in the Tencent conference, and the current range is not recognizable;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Using pattern feature processing technology, the Tencent meeting abide by the "minimum enough" principle.

text: 2.23.2, during the use process, the Tencent Conference abide by the principle of "the shortest time", the extraction of related sound characteristics to use the shortest time fragment that meets the technical requirements, and only use the intermediate feature data during the process processing process.Store any original and intermediate feature data;
label: Data Retention
Important
Data Security
rewrite: Using pattern feature processing technology, the Tencent meeting abides by the "shortest time" principle, and does not store any original and intermediate feature data.

text: 2.23.3, please know, the sound -patterned feature processing technology used in the above process is completely autonomous and controllable for you. If you do not agree with the Tencent meeting to use your sound pattern characteristics, you can and avoid using it and avoid using it.The Tencent Conference's personalized human voice enhancement function, but this does not affect your basic function of using Tencent's conference.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: If you don't agree with the Tencent Conference to use your sound characteristics, you should avoid using personalized human sound enhancement functions.

text: If you want to close this function in the future, go to the "Settings-Personalized Human Voice Enhancement" path to close.
label: Important
Edit/Control

text: 2.23.4 In order to ensure that you have a good experience, it is recommended that you turn off this feature when you have a cold and low voice, etc. when you have a cold, low your voice, etc.

Important

Important

text: Your chat history at the Tencent Conference will only be stored in your terminal device, and we will not keep it in the server.

text: 2.26, joining the meeting schedule: When you choose to synchronize calendar information to Tencent's meeting or join the agenda into your system calendar, we need to obtain your calendar read and write permissions, otherwise we cannot complete the synchronization of the conference schedule.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important

text: 2.27, custom virtual background: When you choose to use a custom virtual background function, you need to upload a photo or a video from your device as a personal virtual background. At this time, we will ask you to open the album authority.

Important

Third, the storage of information
3.1 Methods, periods, and regions of information storage
label: Data Retention

text: We will only store your personal information in a safe manner within the time necessary for the service purpose or under the conditions of laws and regulations.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: Generally, your personal information is stored safely within the time limit for service purposes, unless the law has other requirements.

text: For example, in accordance with the requirements of the "Cyber Security Law of the People's Republic of China", we will retain the relevant network logs related to the Tencent conference application service for not less than six months.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: In accordance with the requirements of the "Cyber Security Law of the People's Republic of China", the use of Tencent's meeting application services to retain related network logs is not less than six months.

text: After your personal information exceeds the retention period, except for laws and regulations, we will delete or do anonymous processing of your information.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: After exceeding the storage period, your personal information will be deleted or anonymous, except for other provisions of laws and regulations.

text: We will store personal information collected in China in China. If we must provide necessary information to the Overseas Edition operating entities of Tencent Conference because of cross -border services, we will take effective measures such as technology and security to ensure your information security.
label: Data Retention
Important
Risk
rewrite: The personal information collected and generated in domestic operations will be stored in China. If we need to provide it abroad, we will take measures to ensure your information security.

text: For data controlled by some enterprises (such as chat records, files, etc.) that can set the retaining period, we will retain relevant information according to the setting of the corporate user;
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: For some enterprise-controlled data that enterprise users can independently set the retention period, it will be retained according to the user's settings.

text: Without the consent of the right holder, we will not view or use chat records and documents retained by business users.
3.2 Notice of the product or service stopping operation

When our products or services terminate the operation, we will notify you in the form of push notifications and announcements, and delete your personal information or perform anonymous processing within a reasonable period, except for other provisions of laws and regulations.
label: Important
Cessation of Operations
rewrite: We will notify you in the form of push notifications and announcements to terminate operations and timely delete or processes your information in a timely manner, except for other provisions of laws and regulations.

text: Fourth, information security
4.1 Safety protection measures
We strive to provide protection for users' information security to prevent information leakage, loss, improper use, unauthorized access and disclosure.
label: Data Security

text: We use multi -directional security protection measures to ensure that user personal information protection is at a reasonable level of security, including technological protection methods, management system control, and security system guarantee.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Ensure personal information security from many aspects such as technical protection means, management system control, and security system guarantee.

text: We recommend that enterprise users use export networks that support transmission link encryption to avoid security risks of data theft caused by malicious attacks in intermediate nodes in the network, ensuring that Tencent meetings can effectively guarantee data security for multiple encryption measures including data content and network linksEssence
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: It is recommended that enterprise users use export networks that support transmission link encryption.

text: Index items such as fault recovery capacity, network access performance, service measurement accuracy, user experience performance all meet the requirements of a trustworthy cloud enterprise level, SaaS service special edition requirements.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The Tencent Conference has obtained a trusted cloud "Enterprise SaaS Service Certification".

text: The technical protection methods we use include but not limited to firewalls, encryption (such as TLS), de -identification or anonymous treatment, access control measures, etc.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Use technical protection methods such as firewalls, encryption, de -identification or anonymous treatment, access control measures, and access control measures.

text: In addition, we will continue to strengthen the security capabilities of software installed on your device.
label: Data Security

text: For example, we will complete some information encryption work locally to consolidate security transmission.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Complete some information encryption work locally.

text: We have established a special management system, process and organization that guarantees personal information security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Establish a special management system, processes and organizations that ensure personal information security.

text: For example, we strictly restrict the scope of personnel access to user information, require them to abide by confidentiality obligations and audit, and punish those who violate obligations in the internal system.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Strictly restrict the scope of the personnel who access information, and sign a confidentiality agreement with them to punish those who violate the obligations of confidentiality.

text: We will also review the management system, processes and organizations from time to time to prevent unauthorized personnel from accessing, using or disclosing users' information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Try the management system, processes and organizations from time to time to prevent unauthorized access, use or disclose user information.

text: We recommend that you pay full attention to the protection of personal information when using products and services, and we will also provide as much as possible to provide multiple personal information protection functions to help you protect your personal information.
label: Data Security

text: 4.2 Safety event disposal measures
If personal information leakage, damage, loss and other security incidents occur, we will start emergency plans to prevent the expansion of security events.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will start emergency plans to deal with information security incidents.

text: After the security incident occurs, we will inform you the basic situation of the incident in the form of push notifications, emails, telephones, etc. in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will inform your basic situation, possible impact, disposal measures, independent prevention suggestions, etc.

text: If it is difficult to achieve one by one, we will issue warnings through announcement and other methods.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If it is difficult to achieve one by one, the warning will be issued through the announcement.

text: Seven, change
We may amend the guidelines for privacy protection in a timely manner.

When the terms of the guidelines for privacy protection are changed, we will prompt you to the change of privacy protection guidelines in a proper way when the version is updated, and explain the effective date of effectiveness.
label: Policy Change

text: Please carefully read the content of the privacy protection guidelines after the change. You continue to use Tencent Conference to indicate that you agree to handle your personal information according to the updated privacy protection guidelines.
label: Policy Change
Important
Risk
rewrite: Continue to use the Tencent meeting to indicate that you agree with the updated privacy protection guidelines.

text: 8. Protection of minors

Our products, websites, and services are mainly for adults, but we attach great importance to the protection of personal information of minors, and handle personal information of minors strictly in accordance with relevant laws and regulations.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Our products, websites and services are mainly for adults.

text: If you are a minor at the age of 14, before using our related services, you should read and agree to the guidance of this privacy protection under the supervision of your guardian (such as your parents).
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are a child under the age of 14, please read and agree to the guidance of the privacy protection under the guardian's monitoring and guidance.

text: In particular, if you are a child under the age of 14, you should provide your personal information after obtaining your guardian's consent and confirming the consent of the privacy protection guidelines and the "Child Privacy Protection Statement".
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are a child under the age of 14, please provide information after the guardian agrees with the guidance of the privacy protection and the "Child Privacy Protection Statement".

text: If you are a child's guardian, please pay attention to whether the child you guard with your service uses our service after obtaining your authorization consent.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: The legal guardian is requested to use the service after obtaining your authorization consent.

text: If you have questions about your personal information of your child, please contact us through contact information in "contact us".
label: Specific Audiences

text: We only use, provide or need to protect minors, provide or openly disclose the information in the case of laws and regulations, the guardian of minors, or the need to protect minors.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Only in the case of laws and regulations, the guardian of minors, or the need to protect minors, provide or disclose personal information to the outside world.

text: If we find that we have collected the personal information of minors in the above range, we will try to delete relevant data as soon as possible.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If the personal information of minors was collected without the consent of the legal guardian, he would try to delete relevant information as soon as possible.

text: Nine, others

"Tencent Privacy Policy" is a general privacy clause for our unified applications of our products and services. Among them, the user rights and information security guarantee measures stipulated in Tencent conferences.

When you use the Tencent Conference -related services, such as "Tencent Privacy Policy" is inconsistent or contradictory with the guidance of this privacy protection, please refer to the guidance of this privacy protection.
"Child Privacy Protection Statement" is an information protection rule for children under 14 years of age.

Within the scope of the "Child Privacy Protection Statement", such as the "Tencent Privacy Policy" and the guidance of this privacy protection guidelines, please refer to the "Child Privacy Protection Statement".
10. Contact us
